DOC.brief_title: Studying Biomarkers Tumor Tissue Blood Samples From Patients With Small Cell Lung Cancer Registered CALGB-140202
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To identify major genetic alteration human small cell lung cancer ( SCLC ) use next-generation sequence focus mutation cod sequence . Secondary - To follow in-depth assessment candidate oncogene tumor suppressor gene use gene expression analysis , cell culture system , murine model SCLC . OUTLINE : DNA isolate archived tumor tissue blood sample analyze genetic mutation gene expression profile use Illumina exome sequencing . Results compare transcriptome tumor ( cell line ) without specific mutation . Cell culture study overexpressing inhibit gene interest also perform mouse model identify potential driver small cell lung cancer .
